sectionHero.title: Your personal stylist
sectionHero.content: Too busy to worry about clothes shopping?
sectionHero.subtitle: Let our stylists shop for your

1.title: Tell us about yourself
1.content: Answer a few questions about your style,sizes, and budget and we will connect you with the best stylist to suit you.

2.title: Receive personally styled outfits
2.content: Your stylist will put together the perfect combination of clothes based on your preferences

3.title: Try on at home
3.content: You have 14 days to try on the outfits. Only pay for the items you keep.

1.title: Hundreds of brands
1.content: Find new favourites, which you would never have found by yourself

2.title: Delivery and return shipping is free
2.content: You have 14 days to try on the items. Only pay for what you keep. Returns are free and super easy.

3.title: Professional advice
3.content: Let our stylists do what they do best. So you can focus on what you care about most.

sectionSentence.sentence: Überlasse unseren Profis das Thema Kleidung und spare Zeit für die wichtigen Dinge im Leben.
